item.title: 24/7 CTF - The Secret Lock
item.author: shiny-labs@kylma.fr (shiny-labs)
item.description: Description Can you reverse the secret combination to open the lock and recover the flag? Solution The archive contains only one file named The Secret Lock.html… Oh dear, a web page! Where’s my binary? :((( On the HTML page, we are greeted by a impressive lock with a blinking “locked” message. That’s some hardcore combination lock. Hope you don’t have one of those on your luggage… class Lock { constructor() { this.
